attributes.description: BMW 1 Series 118i 5-Door AUTO in Excellent condition, Well cared for, a vehicle deserving of your money. * We give good discount on cash buyer! * Free delivery ensured around Gauteng province only. * We additionally organize finance through all the major Banks * Also we give 24hrs turnaround period for fund candidates and same time conveyance on money bargains. You can call, sms, Whatsapp, Email any of our friendly sales team for more information. Working hours Mon-Fri 8:00am – 5:00pm Sat 8am - 2:00pm. You can visit us at 181 Corlett drive Bramley Johannesburg
